789820.name: Reborn
789820.description: Reborn is a first person survival horror game containing and relating to the spirit of the Occultism and mystery that surrounds it. Players will have what has been long missing from so many horror games of this genre, instead of having to hide and fear for your life. You will be the one hunting. The player will have everything they need to make even the most savage and malicious enemy fear for it's life. You'll face a cruel world full of madness and danger, you will expose long dark secrets and fight with ancient evils.
789820.supported_languages:
俄语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
